template_data.IM|muh|leen|refs: The pronounciation is given as "IMM-muh-lean", but this has been revised to "IM-muh-leen" for correct rendition in the phonetic alphabet.

document_data.name: Ymmeline
document_data.mainbody: '''Ymmeline''' ({{pronounce|IM|muh|leen|refs=The pronounciation is given as "IMM-muh-lean", but this has been revised to "IM-muh-leen" for correct rendition in the phonetic alphabet.}}) was a [[Zhentarim]] agent based in the village of [[The Stop]] in the [[Moonsea]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite adventurers league/Quelling the Horde|26}}
document_data.Activities: Ymmeline resided at the inn and tavern called the [[Plodding Plow]].
document_data.Description: She was sighted concealing her appearance by wearing a hood.
document_data.History: ''Circa'' [[1486 DR]], Ymmeline may have encountered some [[adventurer]]s affiliated the Zhentarim at The Stop. Meeting with them in secret, she would order them to capture alive some [[rust monster]]s that had mysteriously disappeared in the area while being hunted by a Zhentarim ally.{{Cite adventurers league/Quelling the Horde|6}}
